messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

new pas issues sent tuesday issues importance high hi could you please escalate below appropriate thank you kind regards applications analyst en sent issues importance high hi could you please investigate why even forecasted for period go client total you think possible be related with assignment field you have mentioned past mandatory be completed when code created please treat request with high priority we need finish our client reports for december thank you th floor blvd district
